name: Counterspell

castingTime.trigger: when you see a creature within 60 feet of yourself casting a spell with Verbal, Somatic, or Material components

description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.

savingThrow.effectOnFailure: The target's spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If the spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.

countersOrDispels.description: On a failed Constitution saving throw by the target, the spell being cast dissipates with no effect. The action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.
